world-sync.Settings.Title: World Sync settings
world-sync.ExportPath.Name: Export Path
world-sync.ExportPath.Hint: The path to export files under the Foundry Data folder, it is 'world-sync' by default
world-sync.EnableTracing.Name: Enable Tracing
world-sync.EnableTracing.Hint: Increases the logging to the browser console for debugging
world-sync.ImportWorldPath.Name: [Advanced] Import World Path
world-sync.ImportWorldPath.Hint: The world path relative to the Markdown Source Path to import from. Defaults to game name.
world-sync.ExportWorldPath.Name: [Advanced] Export World Path
world-sync.ExportWorldPath.Hint: The world path relative to the Export Path to export to. Defaults to the name of the world.
world-sync.JournalEditorLink.Name: Journal Editor Link
world-sync.JournalEditorLink.Hint: Link to the editor you use to update the Journal Markdown. For example a hosted VSCode instance
world-sync.SkipJournalFolders.Name: Skip Journal Folder Import/Export
world-sync.SkipJournalFolders.Hint: List folders you do not want to import/export. Comma delimited.
world-sync.SkipJournalEntries.Name: Skip Journal Entry Import/Export
world-sync.SkipJournalEntries.Hint: List Journal entries you do not want to import/export. Comma delimited.
